title: Is We Dumb? | Shrimp Toss. Idaho. Pullet Surprise. Clogs.
description:
Do you ever think about how a quality control department at toilet paper factory rates their products? You will now. Let's talk about that, a restaurant owner that fires back HARD at one-star reviews, getting caught pretending you're pregnant, gluing clogs to a bird's face, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/uhW5_Oq5KAg

Show Links:
